/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant graffiti, adding a touch of urban artistry to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
